short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick attempt to restore Gmail to usable state on desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension saves screen space by removing extra paddings and margins from several elements in Gmail that appeared after UI disaster happened in September 2018. It is useful for desktop users with old good keyboard and mouse.
